# fragmentFunctionDescriptor

**Instance Property**

Assigns the shader function that this pipeline executes for each fragment.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var fragmentFunctionDescriptor: MTL4FunctionDescriptor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When you don’t specify a fragment function, you need to disable rasterization by setting property [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4RenderPipelineDescriptor/isRasterizationEnabled] to false.
